title: Repository supporting the results presented in the manuscript The worldwide C3S CORDEX grand ensemble: A major contribution to assess regional climate change in the IPCC AR6 Atlas
description: Script to assess the consistency of the worldwide C3S CORDEX grand ensemble in overlapping regions. The script reproduces figures 7 and 8 available in the article --The worldwide C3S CORDEX grand ensemble: A major contribution to assess regional climate change in the IPCC AR6 Atlas--.
